pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scale Mixture of Skew-Normal Linear Mixed Models // It fits scale mixture of skew-normal linear mixed models using either an expectationmaximization (EM) type algorithm or its accelerated version (Damped Anderson Acceleration with Epsilon Monotonicity, DAAREM), including some possibilities for modeling the within-subject dependence. Details can be found in Schumacher, Lachos and Matos (2021) doi:10.1002/sim.8870.
